data.title: Production Database Connection Pool Exhaustion
data.description: The production database connection pool has been exhausted causing service degradation and timeout errors for end users

data.title: Authentication Service High Latency Issue
data.description: The authentication service is experiencing high latency over 2 seconds affecting user login experience across all platforms

data.title: Cache Invalidation Bug in Product Catalog
data.description: Product catalog cache is not invalidating properly after updates causing stale data to be displayed to customers
